sentences.english: The day before the game, he came over to our house in Suwon.
sentences.chinese: 比赛前一天他跑到了我们在水原的家。

sentences.english: If Suwon can continue to grind out victories there will be little room for complaint.
sentences.chinese: 如果水原能继续磨出来的胜利将有投诉的余地不大。

sentences.english: Samsung Bluewings is another test, and the team will need to concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 水原三星是另外一个考验，而且队伍必须集中起来。
